short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: During development of the Web provides some useful tools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WebDEVTools is support a few tools for web developers.

- Simple System Information (Network, Platform, Memory)
   ⇒ IP, MAC Address can be copied to the clipboard.
- View EXIF
   ⇒ Show google maps of GPS info.
- Text Encode / Decode 
- Url Parser / Builder
- Pretty JSON
- Pretty XML & HTML
- Convert Image (file) and DataURI (base64 encoded)
